recipesJson.name: nitriVenus
recipesJson.author: matthewkocanda
recipesJson.description:
Citrus heavy soda with hints of rose and apple. Deeper notes posted shortly.

https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/chbsl4/nitrivenus/

reviews.text: Extremely pleasant and brilliantly fits the profile, a bright and fizzy citrus soda with hints of rose and apple. That combination of FLV Citrus Soda and VT Fizzy Sherbet is an awesome base for a legitimately fizzy citrus soda. I don’t think this recipe would be possible without FLV Rose Essence being so subtle, and the way he used a little Cherry Extract to make it a little redder and sweeter was genius. I think I’d like it with a little cooling to make it extra refreshing next time, but not too much that it ruins the balance of flavors here.
